channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 27th June
item.description:
ENWD OVERGROWN VEGETATION OBSTRUCTING VISIBILITY AT JUNCTION PLEASE STRIM BACK APPROX 10 METRES TO ENSURE VISIBILITY STOP AND GO (Embankment & Cuttings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 27th June
item.description:
28 day with give and take please replace x1 broken rounded kerb stone 900x150m30mm stats required 10x6 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 27th June
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 27th June
item.description:
